segments.text: Seriously, how can someone be so out of touch with their surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is literally overflowing, creating a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring onto the floor and the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And she just stands there, polishing a plate as if nothing is amiss.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle; she must feel it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, those kids are practically performing acrobatics for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is going to tip over any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just so frustrating to watch this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn off that faucet immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children need to get down from that dangerous stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire situation is just asking for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm getting quite worked up just observing this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
